original_title: Lady Fishbourne's Complete Guide to Better Table Manners
overview: This short animation features four guests of curious demeanour who commit unforgivable acts at the dining table. Food flies everywhere while the guests prop their feet up and talk with their mouths full. Thankfully, Lady Fishbourneâ€™s eating etiquette instructions will show these dinner party misfits the error of their ways.
title: Lady Fishbourne's Complete Guide to Better Table Manners
